title: Is it just me or did a lot of the Fnatic fans just disappear.
body: When they are beating SKT and Not TSM.

replies.body: It's NA, what do you expect. And the Huni chants are still strong. My ears hurt.

TSM fans badmouthed Fnatic a lot and spoke about how badly they'd do. SKT fans didn't. It's pretty natural that Fnatic fans would respond to TSM in kind, but there's nothing to respond to with SKT.

Besides, FNC haven't beaten SKT anyway and they probably won't. But I'm proud of them for doing well.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=WhHsEnbG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-10T00:44:09.071+0000)
>
> TSM fans badmouthed Fnatic a lot and spoke about how badly they'd do. SKT fans didn't. It's pretty natural that Fnatic fans would respond to TSM in kind, but there's nothing to respond to with SKT.
> 
> Besides, FNC haven't beaten SKT anyway and they probably won't. But I'm proud of them for doing well.

I was just saying that many Anti-TSM fans exist.

Fnatic had not proved anything until this semi final vs SKT.

Fnatic is a team to watch out for in future. They are going to be a very good team.
